name: Aurity
slogan: Remote working developers using latest tech
description: We offer complex support for your projects whenever they have anything to do with front-end back-end, web development and/or applications. We work as independent, self-sufficient team, but also often cooperate with customers developers. We are capable of going far beyond single apps. With us, you can build whole solutions and architecture for your company to work on. Aurity can solve the most complex problems and drive your business forward. We are proud of working with many Startups and big companies and giving them fully scalable, maintainable and effective solutions that can be developed further for years to come.

team.name: Marcin Puś
team.bioHtml: In @Aurity.co I work in marketing. Beside me, there is plenty of developers. We have great time and a lot of fun while working on exciting projects.

jobs.title: React / React Native Developer
jobs.description:
Description:

We are Aurity, a cutting-edge team with a great passion for development, always looking for new solutions and the best technology. We are working with clients from all around the world who have projects that keep us motivated and help us learn and constantly grow. We are supporting huge startups similar to Uber or Monzo. Developing web, mobile apps and backends.
Our goal is to have fun while coding interesting applications, because life is too short for boring projects. We strive to provide our team with a clear picture of their work and the work of their teammates by having sprints, regular feedbacks, and continuous knowledge exchange or our retreats somewhere in the world.
As a secret we can tell you that we do a lot of R&D project, which might be next React-Native… Join us to create future!
Last but not least, Aurity is run by developers not business people. Full stop.

Requirements:
Must have:
- React Native experience at least 6 months or 1 year with React
- JavaScript > 2 years
- Redux
- Unit / E2E tests
- Very Good command of English
- Knowledge about Functional programming
- Passion for clean code and be up to date with good patterns, latest trends nad
- Very good, stable internet connection

Good to have:
- Experience working remotely
- Published app to App Store or Google play
- TypeScript / Flow
- GraphQL + Apollo/ Relay
- Experience in integrating Swift/Objective-C/Java libraries with React Native
- Experience with Continuous Integration (Bitrise)
- Node or Elixir

Benefits:
- One month #hackerhouse that we arrange every 6-8 months at some tropical destination.You can join the team there, have some fun and work. We make sure, the internet connection is very good. Next will be on Bali or Dominicana?
- Opportunity to join internal workshops.
- Get paid for additional education and conferences.
- Work on R&D tech and create next React-Native
- We are open to new projects, and we would gladly work on a realization of your idea where you would stay the leading owner.
- Want more? Let’s talk we are always open for new ideas!

Sounds like a perfect job?

If you have any questions, feel free fill our form at https://www.aurity.co/join-us

jobs.title: Front End Developer
jobs.description:
Aurity.co is looking for a Front End Developer

You will work with startups and big companies, helping them create complex applications and web solutions. Those applications might be challenging, as they are the core of our customer’s business. Using JIRA and do sprints together with other Aurity team members. You will work remotely from home, or place that suits you best for this kind of work. You will decide yourself when you want to start and finish your working day as long as you are on top of your job. We regularly talk to each other via Skype and other apps. Inside the company, we use Slack, Asana, and plenty of Google Tools.

Working in Aurity is great if you like to keep on learning, using latest tools and technologies. Right now we focus on React, React Native, Relay, Redux and GraphQL. Other developers will try to help you if you have difficulties, but you should have at least one year of experience with React to feel comfortable. You will also have an opportunity to join internal workshops. If you know something cool, that others might want to learn, you could also lead one of them.

Of course, there are other attractions, like #hackerhouse that we arrange every 6-8 months. You can join the team there, have some fun and work from it (we make sure, the internet connection is very good).

Leave us a message through http://www.aurity.co/join-us and become one of us.

jobs.title: JS and React Native Developer - all levels, permanent, London
jobs.description:
We are Aurity, a cutting-edge team with a great passion for development, always looking for new solutions and the best technology. We are working with clients from all around the world who have projects that keep us motivated and help us learn and constantly grow. We are supporting huge startups similar to Uber or Monzo. Developing web, mobile apps and backends.

Our goal is to have fun while coding interesting applications, because life is too short for boring projects. We strive to provide our team with a clear picture of their work and the work of their teammates by having sprints, regular feedbacks, and continuous knowledge exchange or our retreats somewhere in the world.

Last but not least, Aurity is run by developers not business people. Full stop.
Currently we are looking for developers for our new project in London.

With Aurity you will have:

Assurance of working with a great project for our customer.
Experienced and knowledgeable team.
Projects developed with cutting-edge technology that you’ll be proud to show off.
The opportunity to continually improve your skills through in-house workshops and attending conferences.
An influence on your pay. Get a bonus from us and clients for the extra mile you take. 

We offer different types of employment depending on your choice and experience. Below you can find the expectation for each level and employment type.

PERMANENT AGREEMENT:

Junior:
JS experience at least 6 months commercially
React Native experience or React
Redux
Very Good command of English  
Knowledge about Functional programming
Passion for clean code and be up to date with good patterns, latest trends


Mid:
JS experience at least 2 years commercially
React Native or React
Published app to App Store or Google play (good to have)
Redux
Unit / E2E tests 
Very Good command of English  
Knowledge about Functional programming
Passion for clean code and be up to date with good patterns, latest trends

Senior:
JS experience at least 4 years commercially
React Native or React
Published app to App Store or Google play (good to have)
Redux
Unit / E2E tests 
Very Good command of English  
Knowledge about Functional programming
Passion for clean code and be up to date with good patterns, latest trends

Additional points:
- TypeScript / Flow
- GraphQL + Apollo/ Relay
- Experience in integrating Swift/Objective-C/Java libraries with React Native
- Experience with Continuous Integration
- Node

Benefits: 

- One month #hackerhouse that we arrange every 6-8 months at some tropical destination.You can join the team there, have some fun and work. We make sure, the internet connection is very good. Next will be on Bali or Dominicana?
- Opportunity to join internal workshops.
- Get paid for additional education and conferences.
- Work on R&D tech and create next React-Native
- We are open to new projects, and we would gladly work on a realization of your idea where you would stay the leading owner.
- Want more? Let’s talk we are always open for new ideas!


Sounds like a perfect job?

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us or apply through our website:
https://www.aurity.co/join-us

jobs.title: Technical HEad of Sales
jobs.description:
If you are the one who likes to empower everyone with digital products and drive a positive change, then you are in the right place. We are Aurity, a London based Tech Accelerator that brings a digital transformation by connecting the best developers with great companies around the world, mentoring and using the latest technology to accelerate development process 7x.

We’re looking for a results-driven Sales Specialist to assist us with all aspects of the sales process from finding clients, growing partnerships to validating new business models. This person needs to be open to meet with the clients in London, attend meetups and expand our network.

Responsibilities
Find new clients and connect them with existing and future developers.
Prepare ballparks, follow up and maintain positive business and client relationships.
Work on sales and pricing strategy.
Grow our business by learning from the clients.
Plan new offerings and business models.
Prepare sales pitch and validate new ideas.
Find businesses to partner up with to expand our network of contacts through(butnot limited) meetups and conferences.
Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule.
Coordinate sales effort with team members and other departments.
Supply management with reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for services.

Requirements
3-6 years’ of solid experience in B2B selling, ideally for Software Houses, Accelerators or Outsourcing Agencies.
Trackable records of sales with total turn over £200k/ year.
Positive and open-minded attitude, love challenges.
Ready to work within the fast-changing company and with Startup clients.
Ability to create and deliver tailored presentations to the clients.
Familiarity with CRM practices along with the ability to build productive business professional relationships.
Able to pick up a completely cold desk and turn clients into tangible, high-returning partners.

What we offer
The opportunity to work within a dynamic company with a Startup culture.
Working with highly skilled developers.
Visiting many conferences and meetups.
Meeting a team in different locations around the world.
Attractive salary with bonuses.

Applications
Applications must include an English- language CV to be sent to
Employment
Full-time
Job Function
Sales, Account Management, Lead generation
Industry
Technology
